name: MEC Trax Nordic Soft Shell Pants - Women's
description:
Make tracks in cold conditions. Waterproof and windproof front and upper rear panels let you tackle harsh conditions head-on, while the highly breathable thermal rear calf panels prevent you from overheating when you increase intensity. Ankle zippers mean you can pull them off while your boots are still on.Wind- and waterproof front and upper rear panels are 3-layer polyester soft shell with a polyurethane laminate and DWR finish.Fabric has 4-way stretch for full mobility.Brushed Miti Lombardia nylon and spandex thermal rear panels are sweat-wicking and weather-resistant.Elastic waist with internal drawcord and silicone gripper dots provide a secure fit.Side pockets with secure zippered closure.Knee darts for range of motion.Lower leg zippers with gripper elastic work with a variety of footwear.Reflective details keep you visible.

Regular fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
